---
title: "Time Series Analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(pracma)
library(lubridate)
library(tseries)
```
```{r}
bp <- read.csv(file="bp.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
bp[is.na(bp)] <- 0
bp$datetime <- as_datetime(paste(bp$date, bp$time))
```

```{r}
hurstexp(bp$sys)
hurstexp(bp$dia)
hurstexp(bp$pulse)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
adf.test(bp$sys)
adf.test(bp$dia)
adf.test(bp$pulse)
acf(bp$sys)
pacf(bp$sys)
acf(bp$dia)
pacf(bp$dia)
acf(bp$pulse)
pacf(bp$pulse)
ccf(bp$sys,bp$dia)
ccf(bp$sys,bp$pulse)
ccf(bp$dia,bp$pulse)
```
